description: I provided tech support to company users for various IT issues, ensuring high customer satisfaction by delivering knowledgeable and friendly service. I tracked and prioritized IT tickets based on severity and potential business impact, while maintaining up-to-date knowledge of advancements in IT systems and applications. Additionally, I assisted customers through email, live chat, and telephone, effectively resolving technical problems, and managed asset tracking and asset management efficiently.

I provided exceptional customer service by assisting clients courteously and efficiently while maintaining a high level of professionalism through strong verbal and written communication skills. I effectively conveyed technical information to individuals from diverse backgrounds and demonstrated proficient knowledge of Windows 10 & 11, MS Office 365, and audio-visual equipment such as projectors and microphones. Additionally, I acquired expertise in current Android and iOS devices, enabling me to deliver comprehensive technical support.

projects.name: UI/UX realtor Application
description: As part of a team of four, I created a user-centered prototype for a realtor app for Android/iOS. I designed wireframes and prototypes in Adobe XD, including sign-up, home, and rent/sell pages with animations. I documented user requirements, gaining skills in teamwork, time management, communication, creativity, and problem-solving

projects.name: Sheridan Bagle Cart
description: I developed a GUI application named 'Sheridan Shopping Cart' using JavaFX in NetBeans. Designed in Scene Builder, I implemented functionality for components and buttons, applying OOP principles for extensibility. Key features included price calculation, saving, and printing receipts. Collaborating with the team fostered knowledge sharing and continuous learning.

projects.name: Weather Application
description: I created a responsive weather application using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, leveraging the OpenWeather API for real-time data. Bootstrap was used to ensure the application adapts seamlessly to different devices, enhancing user experience. This project demonstrated my ability to integrate APIs and design responsive web applications effectively.

projects.name: Yet To Watch
description: This website developed using ReactJs shows the upcoming movies and tv shows. The user can search for movies and tv shows from previous years.
